version_description:
* Achievements!
* Medals! Find a gold medal from the Big Gift box and give it to one of your workers to level up to the max.
* Plus many small fixes and improvements!

- Not enough medals? Now there's a better chance to find a medal from the Big Gift box!
- You can now also give medals to level 10 workers - and to robots too!
- Many small fixes and improvements

* It is time to MAKE MORE!
* The game now supports multiple languages
* Get your factory full of workers to unlock THE CAMERA and take a group portrait!
* Many small fixes and improvements

* Many, many small fixes and improvements
* Golden Tools multiplier is now shown in the factory multiplier and not anymore in the product price
* Stay tuned for our BIG holiday season update! You better not sleep, you better not slack! Guess who is coming to town?!

* The BIG HO-HO-HOLIDAY UPDATE is here!
* Season special: The first factory is now SANTA'S WORKSHOP with brand new products. Available for a limited time only!
* 20 NEW WORKERS
* NEW ITEMS in the upgrade shop
* Need more luck? LUCKY LEAF owners find medals every time in the Big Gift boxes!
* Already got the GOLDEN TOOLS? There is something even better waiting for you...
* Many small fixes and improvements
* Many small fixes and improvements

* iCloud SAVE GAME SUPPORT
* New super power-up: BOSS RAGE! Make the boss angry and click faster than you’ve ever clicked before!
* Power-ups are more efficient in later levels
* Coin bags contain more free cash
* Improved Change Money feature
* ... and many more small fixes and improvements!

Make More! has already over 5 million players! Thank you all!

v1.3.0 + v1.3.1
* iCloud SAVE GAME SUPPORT
* New super power-up: BOSS RAGE! Make the boss angry and click faster than you’ve ever clicked before!
* Power-ups are more efficient in later levels
* Coin bags contain more free cash
* Improved Change Money feature
* ... and many more small fixes and improvements!

Make More! has already over 6 million players! Thank you all!

* SILLY INCIDENTS! Factories can freeze or get filled with balloons! Clear the situation and get rewards!
* Your WORKERS CAN NOW ESCAP...ummmm... RESIGN!
* 20 NEW WORKERS to hire
* NEW TOOLS to make maximum profits!
* IMPROVED BALANCING of the game
* Many smaller improvements and fixes

1.4.0 + 1.4.1
* SILLY INCIDENTS! Factories can freeze or get filled with balloons! Clear the situation and get rewards!
* Your WORKERS CAN NOW ESCAP...ummmm... RESIGN!
* 20 NEW WORKERS to hire
* NEW TOOLS to make maximum profits!
* IMPROVED BALANCING of the game
* Many smaller improvements and fixes

A HUGE UPDATE for Make More!
* NEW FACTORIES appear when you get your first trophy!
* Make big profits on FASHION INDUSTRY and ROBOT INDUSTRY!
* Get the CLONING MACHINE to hire clones of your favorite workers!
* Collect GOLDEN DUCKS to earn some extra cash!
* 20 NEW WORKERS!
* The ROBOTS are now CHEAPER!
* STICKERS! Yes! We have iMessage stickers!
* Other improvements and bug fixes

v1.5.0 + v1.5.1
A HUGE UPDATE for Make More!
* NEW FACTORIES appear when you get your first trophy!
* Make big profits on FASHION INDUSTRY and ROBOT INDUSTRY!
* Get the CLONING MACHINE to hire clones of your favorite workers!
* Collect GOLDEN DUCKS to earn some extra cash!
* 20 NEW WORKERS!
* The ROBOTS are now CHEAPER!
* STICKERS! Yes! We have iMessage stickers!
* Other improvements and bug fixes

HALLOWEEN SEASON SPECIAL! Your first factory has been transformed into a SPOOKY HALLOWEEN FACTORY!
- Meet FRANKIE THE MANAGER - his factory makes some scary stuff!
- 20 NEW WORKERS - all sinister but silly!
- NEW ITEMS to be found in the shop: AUTOCLICKER and STRONG TABLES upgrade!
- GAME PROGRESS is now faster
- ROBOT UPGRADES are now cheaper
- More iMessage STICKERS!
- Other improvements and bug fixes

1.6.0 + 1.6.1
- Meet FRANKIE THE MANAGER - his factory makes some scary stuff!
- 20 NEW WORKERS - all sinister but silly!
- NEW ITEMS to be found in the shop: AUTOCLICKER and STRONG TABLES upgrade!
- GAME PROGRESS is now faster
- ROBOT UPGRADES are now cheaper
- More iMessage STICKERS!
- Other improvements and bug fixes

You asked for more, we made more! Here's TWO NEW fabulous FACTORIES!
- Sports Factory is managed by a tough boxing champion
- The British Factory is managed by an even tougher boss, some call her the Iron Lady
- There's now altogether 10 different factories with 200 crazy products to make!
- Get one trophy to unlock the new and improved piggy bank daily bonus! 
- Autoclicker power-up is more effective now
... and a pile of smaller improvements!

1.7.0 + 1.7.1  
- Now optimized for iPhone X!
- You asked for more, we made more! Here's TWO NEW fabulous FACTORIES!
- Sports Factory is managed by a tough boxing champion
- The British Factory is managed by an even tougher boss, some call her the Iron Lady
- There's now altogether 10 different factories with 200 crazy products to make!
- Get one trophy to unlock the new and improved piggy bank daily bonus! 
- Autoclicker power-up is more effective now
... and a pile of smaller improvements!

- Now optimized for iPhone X!

- Sports Factory is managed by a tough boxing champion
- The British Factory is managed by an even tougher boss, some call her the Iron Lady
- There's now altogether 10 different factories with 200 crazy products to make!
- Get one trophy to unlock the new and improved piggy bank daily bonus! 
- Autoclicker power-up is more effective now
... and a pile of smaller improvements!

1.7.0 - 1.7.7
- Now optimized for iPhone X!
- You asked for more, we made more! Here's TWO NEW fabulous FACTORIES!
- Sports Factory is managed by a tough boxing champion
- The British Factory is managed by an even tougher boss, some call her the Iron Lady
- There's now altogether 10 different factories with 200 crazy products to make!
- Get one trophy to unlock the new and improved piggy bank daily bonus! 
- Autoclicker power-up is more effective now
... and a pile of smaller improvements!

- Two crazy new factories: The Monkey Boss wants you to make bananas! The Sailor Boss prefers fresh fish.
- Employee of the Day award! A happy worker is a good worker - with 10x profits!
- Coin Rain! Get a huge pile of coins and instant progress boost for your factory.
- 20 new workers to find and hire! There are now 200 different workers altogether!
- The game progress is now a lot faster in the later levels.
- New visual tips to help first-time players to learn the game 
... And many more improvements!

Time Challenges are here!
Check out the special factories with completely new, never before seen bosses and products! Available for a limited time only for all users who have the first trophy from the Big Boss.

New collectibles!
Unlock new collectibles and earn extra cash by participating in Time Challenges.

Bug fixes and improvements
Oh, there's plenty of these all right.

Don't miss out! Update the game and we'll notify you in-game when it's time for the next Time Challenge!
